category: news
title: "GPU maker’s revenue down 19%, possibly due to crypto"
excerpt: "Nvidia, the world’s most popular GPU (commonly referred to as a graphics card) developer, reported a loss of nearly 20% in revenue. The company claims to have “limited visibility” into how much the crypto market crash has affected it but admits that cryptocurrency markets have previously impacted its business."
